articles.author: Stephen Farrand
articles.title: 'Not a lack of balls, just smart racing' - Jonas Vingegaard responds to Evenepoel's Tour de France criticism - Cyclingnews
articles.description: ‘I feel like I’m growing’ - says two-time defending Tour champion before rest day ride
articles.content: Jonas Vingegaard has responded to Remco Evenepoel’s accusations that he didn’t have ‘the balls to race’ during Sunday’s gravel stage at the Tour de France, saying with a smile that he was focused on … [+3889 chars]

articles.title: Seven things we learned at the 2024 British Grand Prix - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton's first Formula 1 win in 945 days might have headlined this year's rain-affected British Grand Prix, but the rest of the weekend burst at the seams with plotlines and announcements. Here's the biggest stories that emerged in this year's Silvers…
articles.content: The "classic British summer" jibes aside, the British Grand Prix weekend faced an atypical barrage of cold and inclement weather - it felt more like a February's half-hearted release of the winter's … [+12879 chars]
